review_details: Went to this restaurant with my family and had an amazing experience. The staff there was very attentive and friendly, as for the meat it was just amazing. The meat was really good quality and flavor. I recommend you try this place if you stop by.

This tour in Santorini Greece was spectacular, something that I will never forget. I just want to say Anthi and her crew, Marcos and Muhammed, knew exactly what they were doing and were very friendly. The crew prepared some spectacular food from whatever was caught. I truly do recommend you take this tour if you have the chance.
reviewFor: Santorini Traditional Fishing Experience with transportation

reviewTitle: Probably best tacos I had in a while.
review_details: This is just a plain out amazing place to go eat at, not only is the food quality good but it tastes amazing. I would absolutely recommend this place to everyone to try. I sure will return.
